snippet: A parallel world of pseudo-academia, with prestigiously titled conferences and journals that will print seemingly anything for a fee, has the scientific community alarmed.
abstract: Scientific community is alarmed by parallel world of pseudo-academia, complete with prestigiously titled conferences and journals that will charge speakers and print seemingly anything for a fee; these predatory journals and conferences have grown in recent years as scientific publishing shifts from traditional business model to open access, which relies on authors or their backers to pay for publication of papers online.
lead_paragraph: A parallel world of pseudo-academia, with prestigiously titled conferences and journals that will print seemingly anything for a fee, has the scientific community alarmed.

headline.seo: For Scientists, an Exploding World of Pseudo-Academia
